item.title: Creating a New Theme
item.description:
Introduction

This tutorial will show you how to create a simple theme in Hugo.

item.title: Migrate to Hugo from Jekyll
item.description:
Move static content to static

Jekyll has a rule that any directory not starting with _ will be copied as-is to the _site output.

item.title: (Hu)go Template Primer
item.description: Hugo uses the excellent go html/template library for its template engine. It is an extremely lightweight engine that provides a very small amount of logic.

item.title: Getting Started with Hugo
item.description:
Step 1. Install Hugo

Goto hugo releases and download the appropriate version for your os and architecture.
